page.title: 17Poringland Characters
page.content: Mr King and his wife have lived at Blackford Hall Farm since his father bought it in 1920.He believes in traditional farming and that they have helped us today.He farms arable and grows a large amount of mustard for Colmans of Norwich.He still has many tools from many years ago,also cions and an arrow head.Mr King belongs to the Farmers Union and is Church Warden. BIOGRAPHY OF MRS.B.GRICE:Was born in Shotesham in 1907,and was 1 of 10 children.She moved from Shotesham to Saxlingham and from there to Florden then to Howe where she was raised.At the age of 5 she went to Brooke school and left when she was 14.She went to work in Framingham Hall where she was made a kitchen maid,then to a house maid,and then to a nurse maid,and later she went into service.
